online.search
Interface SimpleRobotProtocol

All Known Subinterfaces:
RobotProtocol
All Known Implementing Classes:
CheckerPlay, commonRobot, HexPlay
public interface SimpleRobotProtocol

this is the interface to start stop and create robot players.

Author:
ddyer

StartRobot

getBoard

BoardProtocol getBoard()
Returns:
the main board used by the robot

disB

BoardProtocol disB()
Returns:
a copy of the main board used by the robot. During an active search, this will be a copy of board used by the currently selected thread.

getResult

commonMove getResult()
Returns:
get the next move, if it's ready.

getProgress

double getProgress()
get the progress of a search in progress. 0.0 to 1.0

Returns:
a double

setProgress

void setProgress(double d)
set the progress of a search in progress. this is used to reset the process to 0 or 1

Parameters:
d -
